attributes.action: pay the Winter Fuel Payment ONLY to pensioners in receipt of Pension Credit; and use the money saved to either extend it to everyone on Income Support or to increase it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: EVERYONE over 60 is currently eligible for this payment but many hardly need it and possibly just spend it on some sort of extra luxury.  I have always been opposed to the idea of benefits, concessions, etc being given ONLY on the grounds of age (and still feel this way now that I myself am over 60); they should ALL be given on the grounds on INCOME or NECESSITY.
